TABLE.NAME: block_broken_links
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains all data the 'Broken links' block needs to generate and display data

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course in which the URL is located

FIELD.NAME: module
FIELD.COMMENT: Module type in which the URL is located

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course module ID in which the URL is located

FIELD.NAME: urltocheck
FIELD.COMMENT: Actual URL to be checked by the system

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the URL was checked

FIELD.NAME: response
FIELD.COMMENT: Response code sent by the server which the URL points to

FIELD.NAME: ignoreurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Sets whether the URL should be ignored i.e. not be checked for response

TABLE.NAME: block_broken_links_fields
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds table/field definitions for the fields which broken_links will check

FIELD.NAME: modtable
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of a Moodle table e.g. 'forum_posts'

FIELD.NAME: field
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of a field within modtable, e.g. 'message' within 'forum_posts'

FIELD.NAME: fieldformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the field within the table referenced by modtable that holds the format of the field

FIELD.NAME: getstring
FIELD.COMMENT: The string to be used within getstring to describe this field

FIELD.NAME: lastcronid
FIELD.COMMENT: Holds the last-processed id field of the table that was being looked at when the last cron timed out
